column1: Little Goat Diner////Lunch - Ah... I regret that I did not order a sandwich. The sandwiches here are amazing and delicious (I tried my friends' orders). Instead I got the Springy Shrimp & Pork Belly. It was an Asian inspired dish that was not filling and overall mediocre. In general
column2: when it comes to the lunch items I'm just sticking to the burgers and sandwiches. So even though I did not enjoy my lunch
column3: the reason why I am giving this place 5 stars is because the other dishes are that great.
